data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module adds new methods to Graph, using derivation from
    Graph::Directed. The main externally usable new method is
    modular_decomposition_EGMS, which returns the modular decomposition
    tree of a directed graph. This has not been implemented in perl
    before (to the best of my knowledge), and would be useful to people
    implementing graph algorithms. See the references in the
    documentation.
